def.dt: :of or relating to a situation in which people or groups are trying to win a contest or be more successful than others :relating to or involving competition competitive sports It is a very competitive job market. [=a situation in which a lot of people are trying to get jobs] The new technology gave them a competitive advantage/edge. [=a better chance than others of winning or succeeding]
:having a strong desire to win or be the best at something She is a very competitive player. He has a competitive nature. [=he likes to compete and to win]

:as good as or better than others of the same kind :able to compete successfully with others We offer great service at competitive rates. [=rates that are close to those of other companies] You need a degree to be competitive in today's job market. a competitive team [=a team with a good chance to win]
